summary: Rathod Pranjal Baban :23114084 1. Overview and Objective This project aims to build a machine learning classification model to predict whether a credit card customer will default in the next month. Accurate prediction helps financial institutions proactively manage credit risk, reduce losses, and optimize credit strategies. The model is designed to emphasize recall and F2 score to minimize the chance of missing actual defaulters. 2. Data Description Two datasets were used: • Training dataset (train_dataset_final1.csv): ~25,000 records for model development and validation. • Validation dataset (validate_dataset_final.csv): ~5,000 records for final predictions. Feature Categories: • Demographics: age, sex, education, marriage •...
